segments.text: I see the woman standing at the sink, completely focused on the plate in her hands.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is flowing out of the basin, creating a puddle at her feet, but she doesn’t seem to notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit anxious watching her obliviousness to the mess around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sunlight streaming through the window makes everything seem so calm and serene outside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But inside, it's a different story; the puddle is growing, and it could cause someone to slip.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the boy on the stool, stretching his hand toward the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He looks so determined but so precarious, almost like a circus performer trying to balance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but wonder if he has any idea how dangerous this is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Then there's the girl, standing expectantly, her arm raised; she really thinks she’s going to get a cookie!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish the woman would just look up for a second and see the chaos unfolding.
segments.speaker: PAR
